interface.name: modutils_read_module_deps
interface.summary: Read the dependencies of kernel modules.

interface.name: modutils_read_module_config
interface.summary: Read the configuration options used when loading modules.

interface.name: modutils_rename_module_config
interface.summary: Rename a file with the configuration options used when loading modules.

interface.name: modutils_domtrans_insmod_uncond
interface.summary: Unconditionally execute insmod in the insmod domain.

interface.name: modutils_domtrans_insmod
interface.summary: Execute insmod in the insmod domain.

interface.name: modutils_run_insmod
interface.summary: Execute insmod in the insmod domain, and allow the specified role the insmod domain, and use the caller's terminal. Has a sigchld backchannel.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the insmod domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the insmod domain to use.

interface.name: modutils_exec_insmod
interface.summary: Execute insmod in the caller domain.

interface.name: modutils_domtrans_depmod
interface.summary: Execute depmod in the depmod domain.

interface.name: modutils_run_depmod
interface.summary: Execute depmod in the depmod domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the depmod domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the depmod domain to use.

interface.name: modutils_exec_depmod
interface.summary: Execute depmod in the caller domain.

interface.name: modutils_domtrans_update_mods
interface.summary: Execute depmod in the depmod domain.

interface.name: modutils_run_update_mods
interface.summary: Execute update_modules in the update_modules domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the update_modules domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the update_modules domain to use.

interface.name: modutils_exec_update_mods
interface.summary: Execute update_modules in the caller domain.
